classification.title: An ordered list of identifiers for this work, most general at index 0.

realm.title: The name of the realm in which this unique identifier exists

system.title: The system which processed this asset. Not required as the message metadata contains the fallback.

delivered_at.title: The ISO 8601 timestamp of when this asset is considered to be valid from.

processed_at.title: The ISO 8601 timestamp of when this asset was processed. Not required as the timestamp of the message is the fallback.

uri.title: The location of the source asset for the metadata described.

role.title: The role of the source that provided this data.

username.title: The username of the source entity

contributors.title: The array listing, in order, contributors this work is attributed to.

items.title: The GUID of the contributor and their role in contributing to this work.
